compendium_browser.title: GCS Library Browser
compendium_browser.hint: Use the tabs above to select a library.

show_token_modifiers.name: Show Token Modifiers
show_token_modifiers.hint: Enable the Token Effect Modifiers pop-up window.

show_import_button.name: Show Import Button
show_import_button.hint: Toggle whether the "Import" button is displayed on character sheet headers.

basic_set_pdfs.name: Basic Set PDFs
basic_set_pdfs.hint: Select Combined or Separate and use the associated PDF codes when configuring PDFs. Note: If you select Separate, the Basic Set Campaigns PDF should open up to page 340 during the PDF test.

server_side_file_dialog.name: Use Server-Side File Dialog
server_side_file_dialog.hint: When enabled, file prompts (for character sheet uploads, etc.) will use the FoundryVTT file dialog, which searches through files on the Foundry server. When disabled, file prompts will search the user's local machine.

portrait_path.name: Default Portait Path
portrait_path.hint: Choose where character portraits are stored (in the global Foundry User Data directory, or the local world directory).

portrait_overwrite.name: Overwrite Portraits
portrait_overwrite.hint: Choose whether character portraits are overwritten on import

enable_token_modifier_window.name: Enable Token Modifier Window
enable_token_modifier_window.hint: Enable the Token Modifier Window, which shows modifiers related to selected and targeted tokens

ssrt.name: Range Modifier Formula
ssrt.hint: Sets the formula used to calculate range penalties.

roll_formula.name: Default Roll-Against Formula
roll_formula.hint: Set the die roll performed when rolling against a Skill, Attribute, etc.

import_body_plan.name: Legacy: Import Body Plan
import_body_plan.hint: Choose whether to overwrite character body plans for Legacy Characters.

choices.no: Do not overwrite with imported body plan
choices.ask: Ask before overwriting with imported body plan

import_name.name: Legacy: Import Name
import_name.hint: Choose whether the character's name is overwritten on import. This is useful if the character name used in GCS/GCA is different from that used in Foundry.

import_hp_fp.name: Legacy: Import HP & FP
import_hp_fp.hint: Choose whether to overwrite HP & FP when importing Legacy Characters.

choices.no: Do not overwrite with imported HP & FP
choices.ask: Ask before overwriting with imported HP & FP

initiative_formula.name: Initiative Formula
initiative_formula.hint: Sets formula to roll to decide on combat turn order

colors.name: Colors
colors.label: Color Settings
colors.hint: Colors used throughout the GURPS Game Aid.

default_sheet_settings.name: Default Sheet Settings
default_sheet_settings.label: Edit Default Sheet Settings
default_sheet_settings.hint: Sheet settings used when creating new Characters.

default_attributes.name: Default Attributes
default_attributes.label: Edit Default Attributes
default_attributes.hint: Attributes assigned when creating new Characters.

damage_types.name: Damage Types
damage_types.label: Edit Damage Types
damage_types.hint: Damage Types mapped to an Attribute Pool.

default_resource_trackers.name: Default Resource Trackers
default_resource_trackers.label: Edit Default Resource Trackers
default_resource_trackers.hint: Resource Trackers assigned when creating new Characters.

default_move_types.name: Default Move Types
default_move_types.label: Edit Default Move Types
default_move_types.hint: Move Types assigned when creating new Characters.

default_hit_locations.name: Default Body Type
default_hit_locations.label: Edit Default Body Type
default_hit_locations.hint: The Body Type assigned when creating new Characters.

roll_modifiers.name: Custom Modifiers
roll_modifiers.label: Edit Custom Modifiers
roll_modifiers.hint: Edit roll modifiers which appear in the Custom category.

default_damage_location.name: Default Damage Location
default_damage_location.hint: Set the default hit location used to apply damage.

compendium_browser_packs.name: Compendium Browser Packs
compendium_browser_packs.hint: Choose which packs are included in the compendium browser.

base_books.name: Base Rulebooks
base_books.hint: Choose which base rulebooks are used for in-built references
